critique: This document is an executive order from Franklin D. Roosevelt approving an agreement related to the construction industry under the National Industrial Recovery Act. The Act itself was a major intervention in the economy during the Great Depression. Here's an analysis of its political bias:Ideological Tilt: The National Industrial Recovery Act was a key part of FDR's New Deal, which was a liberal response to the Great Depression.
